name: ShopApper: Mobile App for WooCommerce
author: Weptile

sections.description:
ShopApper is a WooCommerce mobile app builder service that automatically builds mobile apps for all WooCommerce stores with 3 simple steps:
1. Install this plugin to your WooCommerce store.
2. Sign up to ShopApper
3. Customize, Build & Download your own app from ShopApper Admin Panel

This plugin includes the necessary integration functions for ShopApper admin panel and the generated mobile apps to communicate with the WordPress / WooCommerce site and function properly.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the \”mobile-app-for-woocommerce\” plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
How can I create a customer mobile app for my WooCommerce store?

You can download this plugin, sign up to ShopApper, and build your app within minutes.

How can I publish my WooCommerce mobile app to Google Play Store or Apple App Store?

You can sign up to ShopApper and build your app within minutes. Once you\’ve built your Android and/or iOS apps, you can download your APK or IPK files from your ShopApper Admin Panel and simple follow the Google Play Store or Apple App Store publishing process. When the process requires you to upload your app file, you just upload this APK or IPK file.

How Can I Customize my WooCommerce mobile app?

You can customize your app anytime from the ShopApper Admin Panel. As soon as you save your app settings, your customers will instantly start using your new settings on their already downloaded apps.

How many updates / versions can I make with my WooCommerce mobile app?

Our service is \”Unlimited Everything\”. Unlimited updates, products, categories, sales. Anything you get, you get unlimited.

Can I upgrade, downgrade or cancel my subscription anytime?

Yes. You can modify or cancel your account level anytime from ShopApper

Can I request new or additional features?

Yes. We\’re on a mission to build ShopApper with our store owner\’s requests. Afterall it\’s your app, and we think you should define what features should be in it.

short_description: Native iOS & Android mobile app for your WooCommerce store customers. Build a fully functional, customizable native app within minutes.
description:
ShopApper is a WooCommerce mobile app builder service that automatically builds mobile apps for all WooCommerce stores with 3 simple steps:
1. Install this plugin to your WooCommerce store.
2. Sign up to ShopApper
3. Customize, Build & Download your own app from ShopApper Admin Panel

This plugin includes the necessary integration functions for ShopApper admin panel and the generated mobile apps to communicate with the WordPress / WooCommerce site and function properly.
